Author: dotnet
Description:
See how you can get ahead of incidents and fix issues before they are reported. In this demo-heavy session we instrument an ASP.NET Core app with Application Insights and Azure SRE Agent, watch the agent detect performance regressions in real time, triage root cause, and trigger safe rollbacks. We‚Äôll build a custom sub-agent, set scheduled health checks, and wire Teams alerts‚Äîallowing you to reduce incidents, customer pain and ship faster with confidence.
